summary.span: 在给定类的方法的情况下，提供一种交换方法体实现的快速方法。

span.span: Provides a fast way to swap method body implementation given a method of a class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SwapMethodBody (Type cls, int methodtoken, IntPtr rgIL, int methodSize, int flags);
.method public static hidebysig void SwapMethodBody(class System.Type cls, int32 methodtoken, native int rgIL, int32 methodSize, int32 flags) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SwapMethodBody (cls As Type, methodtoken As Integer, rgIL As IntPtr, methodSize As Integer, flags As Integer)
public: static void SwapMethodBody(Type ^ cls, int methodtoken, IntPtr rgIL, int methodSize, int flags);
static member SwapMethodBody : Type * int * nativeint * int * int -> unit

param.name: cls
param.span: 包含方法的类。

span.span: The class containing the method.

param.name: methodtoken
param.span: 方法的标记。

span.span: The token for the method.

param.name: rgIL
param.span: 指向方法的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the method.

param.span: 它应包括方法头。

span.span: This should include the method header.

param.name: methodSize
param.span: 新方法体的大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The size of the new method body in bytes.

param.name: flags
param.span: 控制交换的标志。

span.span: Flags that control the swapping.

param.span: 请参见常数的定义。

span.span: See the definitions of the constants.
Swaps the body of a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用此方法交换全局方法的主体。You cannot use this method to swap the body of a global method. 此方法只能由创建动态模块的客户端调用，该模块包含要交换其方法体的类型。The method can only be called by the client that created the dynamic module that contains the type whose method's body is being swapped. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为新的主体交换方法体。The following example illustrates how to swap a method body for a new body. 它还说明了如何获取现有方法的方法标记，以及如何构造表示要传递到`SwapMethodBody`的 Microsoft 中间语言（MSIL）代码的字节 blob。It also illustrates how to obtain a method token for an existing method and how to construct a blob of bytes representing the Microsoft Intermediate Language (MSIL) code to be passed to `SwapMethodBody`. [!code-cpp[Classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic MethodRental.SwapMethodBody Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: is .
The type is not complete.

exception.span: 小于 1 或大于 4128767（十六进制 3effff）。

span.span: is less than one or greater than 4128767 (3effff hex).
to execute unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

param.name: riid
param.span: 留待将来使用。

span.span: Reserved for future use.

param.span: 必须为 IID_NULL。

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

param.name: rgszNames
param.span: 要映射的名称的传入数组。

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

span.span: Count of the names to be mapped.

param.name: lcid

span.span: Caller-allocated array which receives the IDs corresponding to the names.

summary.span: 将一组名称映射为对应的一组调度标识符。

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN library。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.

exception.span: 此方法称为使用 COM IDispatch 接口的后期绑定。

span.span: The method is called late-bound using the COM IDispatch interface.

span.span: Retrieves the type information for an object, which can then be used to get the type information for an interface.
